detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ABFi (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ABFi.sol#73-195) has payable functions:
	 - ABFi.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ABFi.sol#85-87)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
